attributes.action: Guarentee that the electorate of UK will have a vote on the acceptance of any EU constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have given up so much that a constitution for the EU would mean giveing up more power. It will speed up the trickle of powers away from UK.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Guarentee that the electorate of UK will have a vote on the acceptance of any EU constitution."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14534.asp

Prime Minister's Office
